Neat 1031 plugin access via NeatSession (#1233)

# Description

This PR provides interface in NeatSession for accessing external plugins
(if they exist). If external plugin does not exist a nice error is
returned:
![Screenshot 2025-06-06 at 15 12
51](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/b9106baf-bfbd-4bb8-909a-eb8509ff4360)

Example of WIP external plugins:
- [IMF Importer](https://github.com/thisisneat-io/imf-importer-plugin)
- [CFIHOS](https://github.com/cognitedata/industrial-standard-processor)

To reviewers: this is stacked PR on top of
[Neat-1030](https://github.com/cognitedata/neat/pull/1232).

## Bump

- [x] Patch
- [ ] Minor
- [ ] Skip

## Changelog
### Added

- Access to the neat plugins via NeatSession
